sources.title: Destination Gobi (1953) Richard Widmark · Don Taylor
sources.description: A squad of US soldiers battles their way through the Gobi Desert during World War II.   Robert Wise's first color film.

metadata.Plot: A group of US Navy weathermen taking measurements in the Gobi desert in World War II are forced to seek the help of Mongol nomads to regain their ship while under attack from the Japanese air force. The Mongols are rewarded by an airlift of the finest saddles.
metadata.Actors: Richard Widmark, Don Taylor, Max Showalter
